summary: A TensorFlow Keras layer that implements the core text processing part of a grouped Vision Transformer model, handling the creation, retrieval, and replacement of input token embeddings while defining the layer's build and forward (call) behavior.
business_intent: To provide a reusable, configurable component that manages text embeddings within a Vision Transformer architecture, enabling easy integration, customization, and reuse of the embedding logic in larger deepâ€‘learning pipelines.
